titles.title: To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to exclude cooperative employing units from multiple employer welfare arrangements.
To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to exclude cooperative employing units from multiple employer welfare arrangements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

bill.summary: Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to exclude cooperative employing units from multiple employer welfare arrangements.
